TwistedElixir.NAME: Twisted Elixir
DESCRIPTIONS: Make an enemy stronger, but gain increased rewards based on its current health when thrown.

HauntedGourdPotion.NAME: Haunted Gourd
DESCRIPTIONS: Discover a #ySkill, #yPower, #yAttack which cost 0 this turn. Add a random #bCurse and #bSlimed to your hand.

SneckoExtractPotion.NAME: Snecko Extract
DESCRIPTIONS: Drink this and something extremely random will happen.

AntidotePotion.NAME: Antidote
DESCRIPTIONS: Remove all #yPoison and #yVenom and heal for each point removed.
